snippet: Boston beat the Memphis Grizzlies, 98-80, as Kevin Garnett collected 24 points and 9 rebounds.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Boston Celtics defeat the Memphis Grizzlies, 98-80; other NBA news noted.
lead_paragraph: Boston beat the Memphis Grizzlies, 98-80, as Kevin Garnett collected 24 points and 9 rebounds.

headline.seo: Garnett Leads Celtics to Fourth Straight Win
headline.main: Rejuvenated Garnett Carries Celtics to Fourth Straight Victory
headline.print_headline: Rejuvenated Garnett Carries Celtics to Fourth Straight Victory
